articles.title: Why the U.S. loves Ted Lasso - A show about two things Americans used to despise - Goal.com
articles.description: Thirteen-year-old Axel Kei became the youngest player to feature for a professional sports team in the United States as he made his debut for Real Monarchs at the age of just 13.
